section.name: Merlin NT Service
section.p: The Merlin installation includes support for the running of a Merlin Kernel as an Windows(TM) NT4 Service.

After installation please check the service startup parameters by using the Service manager in the Windows Control Panel.

subsection.name: Service Configuration
subsection.p: Please make sure that the service is correctly assigned with a user or system account. If you are using Merlin under the system account you must ensure that the MERLIN_HOME environment variable is declared in system scope.
